ValidationRule.description: Rule to create an account by an ICONiCS user 04-12-2019: VR activated with restricted field based on MyCC mandatory fields (RMS search in the Iconics Flow doesn't give all the information required by this rule).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT($User.BypassVR__c),
ISNEW(), CONTAINS(LOWER($Profile.Name), "iconics"),
OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Salutation )), /*ISBLANK(TEXT(Gender__pc)),*/ ISBLANK(LastName), ISBLANK(FirstName), ISBLANK(TEXT(SPO_Country__pc)) /*ISBLANK(TEXT(Typology__pc)),
AND( ISBLANK( PersonEmail), ISBLANK( PersonMobilePhone) )*/ ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Civility, FirstName, LastName and Country are required
